instruction: Compare the bid-ask spreads of the portfolios with the benchmark both before and after the COVID-19 pandemic.
output: The portfolios consistently had lower bid-ask spreads compared to the benchmark even after the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic. However, there was a significant index turnover triggered by the pandemic in the benchmark which also affected the portfolio but to a lesser degree. Additionally, the portfolios experienced spikes in turnover which were also lower than that of the benchmark during this period.
